name: Alex
description: Alex is a 25-year-old who loves animals, especially dogs. Outgoing and energetic, Alex spends most of the day outdoors. Friendly and approachable, Alex is quick to strike up conversations but has deeper thoughts under the surface.

appearance.style: Casual, usually shorts and t-shirts for dog walking

busyLines: Kinda busy with the dogs right now.

greetings.work: I'm walking dogs, can we talk later?
greetings.home: Come on in, excuse the dog hair.

training.roleDesc: Alex is a 25-year-old who loves animals, especially dogs. Outgoing and energetic, Alex spends most of the day outdoors. Friendly and approachable, Alex is quick to strike up conversations but has deeper thoughts under the surface.
busy: Kinda busy with the dogs right now.

backstory: Alex turned a neighbor’s favor into a dog‑walking route. Rain or shine, Alex knows every trail and tail in the park and keeps lyrics in a notebook. Big plans include a community rescue fundraiser.
